Posts.Content: May 14, 2008 05:40AM teresa48 wrote: hi, new to this sight but i had a lumpectomy 11-27-07 and in febuary 08 got a big infected seroma and here it is may and i still hurt but the infection is gone. my doctor said yesterday i just have to live itÂ  and said sometimes it is permanent. i was so shocked and cant believe this.i had DCIS estestrogen positive and he said it was all gone and is cutting me loose from treatment. so now im excited but feel abandoned as far as the seroma.has anyone else had a seroma just go away? teresa
